CustomField.description: Created in January 2025. Will be used by the new outbound BDR sales team, and this checkbox will allow the team to see which records the BDR team should reach out to, and ensure Marketo doesn’t send Marketing emails unless opted in. This field Is manually updated by RevOps team.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Will be used by the new outbound BDR sales team, and this checkbox will allow the team to see which records the BDR team should reach out to, and ensure Marketo doesn’t send Marketing emails unless opted in. This field Is manually updated by RevOps team.
CustomField.label: BDR Eligible
